extension.name: Cookie Consent Neo - Gantry Atom (Hydrogen)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Cookie Consent Neo - Atom for Gantry 5 Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTA: La atomo viene installata nel template G5 Hydrogen.
Se si desidera installare su un template Gantry 5 diverso, bisogna copiare manualmente i due file cookie-consent-neo.yaml e cookie-consent-neo.html.twig in /templates/[NOME-TEMPLATE]/custom/particles.
